title: @Riot, Is there a way to not get maokai at the end of the season if you're gold.
body:
Idk if i'm the only one like this, but i already own every champ i want in my profile. And, maokai isn't one of them. I have 71,400 IP so i could own every champ in the game if i wanted, but i really don't. the reason why i don't own all champs are these:
1. Aside from free week champs i will always get a champ that i like in random select game modes.
2. mystery chests are guaranteed to give me a skin for a champ i like(regardless of whether the skin itself is bad IMO)
3. it's easier to scroll through champs in champ select/ranked. since i only own champs that i will actually play it makes it easier to find the champ i want. It also helps figure out what champ i want since i don't have to sort through all the champs that i don't like to play/will not play.
4. I really just don't want to taint my profile. like i said, I ONLY own champs that i like which is 57 I'm working on getting all of them to at least mastery 5, but having maokai would ruin my perfect profile.

I know some might think this is a bit silly, but i've kept my profile like this since season 4 for a reason. I have played every champ in the game(except kled) at least once. i give all of them a chance to see if i will like them and i REALLY don't like maokai... like at all... he's a incredibly boring champ IMO and i will never play him unless a random game mode forces me too. So could someone at riot make an exception for my account and not give me victorious maokai pls? i hate to sound ungrateful, but i really don't want it.

replies.body:
It's not uncommon for players to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to request we remove specific content from their account. I think in this case, we may be able to help you out only **after** you've received the Season rewards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Porocles has already reached out and helped me with this. he said pretty much the same thing, thank you very much for the reply though XD. i really appreciate it.
